alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:59PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Lakepoint Resort State Park to near Hurtsboro, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Hurtsboro, Midway, Clayton, Hawkinsville, Spring Hill, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Osco, White Oak, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Guerryton, Batesville, Twin Springs, Rutherford, Lugo and Mount Andrew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
